entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
